item.description: Hear a free presentation by Astronaut Jerry L. Ross at 2PM and attend a autograph signing for his new book, "Spacewalker" at St Michael's Parish Church in Bedford, Massachusetts on Saturday, April 6, 2013. There will be plenty of great displays and activities organized by a number of organizations like the Aldrich Astronomical Society, Inc., One Giant Leap, Explore Mars, Inc., the Clay Center Observatory and the Massachusetts Air and Space Museum from 1 to 4PM in addition to the astronaut talk and autograph session. Astronaut Jerry Ross has flown in space 7 times and will offer an insiderâ€™s account of the US Space Shuttle program, from before its first launch through the final landing, and the building of the International Space Station. There will be plenty of handouts, updates about the US Space Program plus information about future astronomical events from the Aldrich Society and the Clay Center Observatory as well as Mars Exploration updates my the Explore Mars, Inc. Interested in a copy of Jerry Ross' book? Contact One Giant Leap, the organizer of this event at onegiantleap@charter.net.
item.name: Attend Massachusetts Air and Space Day!
